name: places/ChIJ97ib6JlZwokRBUfDwCxEBeI
formattedAddress: 60 University Pl, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 60 University Pl, New York, NY 10003, USA

editorialSummary.text: Australian company known for high-end skincare products & gift kits, plus home & body fragrances.

originalText.text: While I managed to find a perfume that I liked, one of the associates was pretentious and treated my friend and I like we were kids who just walked into the store to cause trouble. It was disappointing because I have gone to the store before, and other staff members have been kind and pleasant. Not to mention that the same associate and another associate were talking about one of the other associates? I found it quite rude. Overall, I expected better from Aesop.

text.text: While I managed to find a perfume that I liked, one of the associates was pretentious and treated my friend and I like we were kids who just walked into the store to cause trouble. It was disappointing because I have gone to the store before, and other staff members have been kind and pleasant. Not to mention that the same associate and another associate were talking about one of the other associates? I found it quite rude. Overall, I expected better from Aesop.

originalText.text: Typically the staff is unpretentious and extremely helpful and it was no different at the University Street location. Alex helped us and he was very patient and attentive even though he and his colleague had to juggle a few customers. Aesop has fantastic products albeit it's a bit pricey, but wouldn't you want to die a little poorer and live a fuller life of good experiences?

text.text: Typically the staff is unpretentious and extremely helpful and it was no different at the University Street location. Alex helped us and he was very patient and attentive even though he and his colleague had to juggle a few customers. Aesop has fantastic products albeit it's a bit pricey, but wouldn't you want to die a little poorer and live a fuller life of good experiences?

originalText.text: I like their products I sampled in store today. I liked the sales associate. It was nice to wash your hands with their soap and then put on hand lotion. I was thankful for the samples I received and look forward to trying them and possibly purchasing some products for myself or gifts in near future. It seems like a wholesome botanical natural store. Parsley eye cream!

text.text: I like their products I sampled in store today. I liked the sales associate. It was nice to wash your hands with their soap and then put on hand lotion. I was thankful for the samples I received and look forward to trying them and possibly purchasing some products for myself or gifts in near future. It seems like a wholesome botanical natural store. Parsley eye cream!

originalText.text: I called in the location asking about an item I found from the website if it were in store and I was glad to find out it’s open for business but just only for “store pickup”, the representative was very pleasant and guileful when I asked her how I could place to purchase for the item I was interested. When I arrived at the location…(the best thing to do is plan ahead before coming what you want to buy)…there’s a table placed at the door entrance…there’s actually no walking in…I told her who I were when I made the call, she had the item ready for what I wanted, brings along the credit card slot and she disinfected it…which that was very cool and safe…and made my purchase complete. I am thankful the representative assistance was serving and thoughtful, I plan on coming back again soon for another purchase.

originalText.text: I've been coming to this location the past 2-3 years and each visit is a pleasant experience. Every sales associate I've encountered is extremely polite, familiar with all the products, and willing to help you find what you're looking for. Would recommend anyone to take a peek into this little store.
